title: gearbest.com - Original Xiaomi Wool Touch Gloves - FEMALE STYLE AS THE PICTURE @ Xiaomi - 10,99 $* inkl. Versand
text:
Original Xiaomi Wool Touch Gloves USD 12.39 Discount:46 % OFF FREE SHIPPING 4.9 (244 Customer Reviews ) Description Original Xiaomi Wool Touch Gloves for All Touch Screen Mobile Phone / Tablet / ATM - Male Style Main Features: • Original Xiaomi wool touch gloves will help you to enjoy using your smartphone in cold weather because it has special material on fingers • Warm gloves with built-in conductive fingertips to enjoy full use of your touchscreen without exposing your bare hands• Your touchscreen speed and accuracy while wearing the Xiaomi gloves will amaze you• Suitable for iOS and Android phones and all touchscreen devices• Suitable for men and women, 3 color optional• A unique gift for you friends and family Notes: • Male Style : Glove length is about 17.5 - 20.5cm, the palm width is about 19.5 - 22.5cm• Female Style : Glove length is about 16 - 18.5cm, the palm width is about 17.5 - 20.5cm Specification Product weight: 0.130 kg Package weight: 0.170 kg Package size (L x W x H): 10.00 x 10.00 x 5.00 cm / 3.94 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches 
Package Contents Package Contents: 1 x A Pair of Original Xiaomi Wool Touch Gloves You Might Also Consider By panagiotis poulopoulos Dec-31/2015 07:12:20 
Question: when will they be avaliable? Reply: Hi Panagiotis, I am sorry that this item is unavailable due to the supply's issue. We can not sure when it would be restocked again. It depends on the customers' demand and the production of this item. If you really like this item, please add it to your favorite. We will try to replenish it as much as we can. Thank your for your kind understanding. Please feel free to ask if you have further questions. By raim Dec-02/2015 04:12:20 
when it will be available? Reply: Hi raim, We are sorry that our supplier stop producing this item. We could not sure when they will restock the item.
